TopicTitle: New ideas and Concept art, for those who can build it! Write a review!! ;)

Articles.Content:
more new cockpit designs for SPH command modules

"Lola" class cockpits 

 

Ok ok it's for the Scorpion Mk2: two types of wheels and suspension systems for a fairly large rover vehicle. Someone requested that I should draw the undercarriage clearer - so here's a good view what I think the undercarriage should look like.

Some new ideas for airplane cockpit designs for *inspiration*

the Croc cockpit

New ideas for Kerbals spacesuits, time for shopping?

Different types of Kerbal Helmet designs...

From the "KSPIndustries" 3rd design concept; Bigger engines, Fixed wings, slightly more spacious.

Jetly Mk3

This is another [2nd] design of an emergency escape vehicle that (in emergency) detacthes itself out of the attachement unit. It has built it wings which upon detachment it opens up and its designed to glide its way back to Kerbin [KSC] it does not have built it landing gear but it is equiped with parachute. This is a purpose built vehicle for use once and for emegency only.

Jetfly Mk2

Above is the 1st design of an emergency pod, built purpose is for an emergency evacuation. With built in RCS and single use of "getaway" rocket to steer away from emergency. Both designs are only for one Kerbal pilot. It has built in parachute as standard for safe landing back to Kerbin.

JetFly Mk1

Utility Cabin with Large Windows. U-Cabin KSPindustriesLtd

"Scorpion Mk1" Cockpit

"Scorpion Mk2" aka JebCrawler

alt='r2pGD02.jpg?1'>

"Crane Mk1" cockpit

'Flightline'

Flightline Mk1

U-Cabin Mk1

U-Cabin Mk2 [A WORKING PROGRESS]

Pretty awesome concepts! I would definitely enjoy seeing these as higher tech level parts when we get career mode in the game!
These are exhaust nozzles to go on side of any components.
These look amazing

Hi you KSP fans/developers/guys, hope you like some of these concept sketches. Please feel free to comment and also share your ideas too! would love to see what you guys can come up with! Gonna try to keep putting up more sketches and ideas so hope anyone whose got the know how to build it and to put it in the game or mods.

I know i've started another thread but try to keep the pictures in one place....
unfinished cockpit view... sorry
Are those exhaust nozzles supposed to be a sort of radial engine/intake? or are they going to be bits that you ad because they look cool?
more of radical engines, now come to think of it it would look good as air intakes is a good idea
Those are for radical engine exhaust, just like VTOL aircrafts like the Harrier jets. But air intake is a a good idea!
Cool. And those command pods look (for the most part) like they will be used by Manned Orbital Construction Spacecraft.

I was thinking of instead of sending precious Kerbals into space why not Robots? Need to find a name for it! which, of course if its in the game you would control it... just like controlling a Kerbanaught.

Does it need to be more Kerbal look alike or just more simple in design?

And yes it does comes with a backpack full of EVA fuels and lights on the head.

Nice, although I think you should make it look like it folds up and is crammed into something stuck on the side of a rocket. That way you still need a probe core, but you can have them get out and then occupy space in a command pod. Like, for instance, when Bill and Bob refuse to come along on a particularly dangerous mission, you can have 2 of those bots take their place in the crew.
Muusst Not Steall Ideaads from Threaad!

Hey, If you credit the originator, maybe you can make these parts to see how well they work. Also, I seriously want that robot. Though I think it should be more durable than a Kerbal, and have the capability to do MUCH more once on EVA.

Muusst Not Steall Ideaads from Threaad!

Ok sorry, i have not read all the stuff in the forums ok, i am a newbie to KSP!

Nice, although I think you should make it look like it folds up and is crammed into something stuck on the side of a rocket. That way you still need a probe core, but you can have them get out and then occupy space in a command pod. Like, for instance, when Bill and Bob refuse to come along on a particularly dangerous mission, you can have 2 of those bots take their place in the crew.

I guess you're right, it does look too bulky. I do like the idea of being flatpacked and can strap to a side of a rockets/landers/probes. gonna start drawing away for ideas now!!

Ok, bare with me for the rough sketch.

Just imagine it a kerbal flatpacked robot... this is what i could come up with... what do you think? strap it on a side of a rocket and go! bye bye Bill and Bob! lol

Approx Size compared to a kerbal, maybe a little taller as the legs and arms unfold.

mmmm... look abit like WALL-e with legs! hehe
Looks great! I seriously want someone to make these parts!
It looks a bit like Johnny Five.

I was thinking of instead of sending precious Kerbals into space why not Robots? Need to find a name for it! which, of course if its in the game you would control it... just like controlling a Kerbanaught.

Does it need to be more Kerbal look alike or just more simple in design?

And yes it does comes with a backpack full of EVA fuels and lights on the head.

lol you have no idea how close you have come to something im working on
Hey Devo, will the thing you are working on fold up into a part that's smaller than a Kerbal?
Wanner, I absolutely love your art style. I personally love the rough sketch look to your stuff, makes it look more like concept art.
